configuration.name: 客户投诉情况--行业
configuration.query: SELECT c_x, c_y, c_value, c_x_label, c_y_label FROM( (SELECT '未投诉客户数' c_x,c_industry1 c_y,COUNT(0) c_value,'未投诉客户数' c_x_label,c_industry1 c_y_label FROM t_customer WHERE c_industry1 IN ( SELECT c_industry1 FROM t_customer_complaint cc INNER JOIN t_customer c ON cc.c_customer_id= c.c_id ) AND c_id NOT IN ( SELECT c_customer_id FROM t_customer_complaint ) AND 1=1 GROUP BY c_industry1) UNION ALL (SELECT '投诉客户数' c_x,c_industry1 c_y,COUNT(cc.c_customer_id+cc.c_complaint_id) c_value,'投诉客户数' c_x_label,c_industry1 c_y_label FROM t_customer_complaint cc INNER JOIN t_customer c ON cc.c_customer_id=c.c_id INNER JOIN t_dict_complaint d ON d.c_id=cc.c_complaint_id WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY c.c_industry1 ) ) mm ORDER BY mm.c_y ,mm.c_x ,mm. c_value DESC
